problem.markdown:
As a researcher, what type of user population are you most likely to employ?
(x) The ASSISTments student population (x) My own local population (x) Mechanical Turk, or another 'automated' subject pool (x) Other
problem.p: As a researcher, what type of user population are you most likely to employ?

choicegroup.choice: Mechanical Turk, or another 'automated' subject pool
